record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 2316 and H.R. 2317

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, it is my understanding that there are two bills at the desk, and I ask for their first reading, en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report the bills by title for the first time.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for a second reading, en bloc, and object to my own request, en bloc.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bills will receive their second reading on the next legislative day.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I also wish you a happy birthday.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Thanks for being here on your birthday. I appreciate it.
